| Overview                = The Afghuli were the largest and most dominant tribesmen group dwelling in the southwestern [[Himelian Mountains]] above [[Vendhya]],{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #30|; A Gazetteer of the Hyborian Age, Afghuli's entry}}<!-- almost same words as in the entry, hard to change as there is few words: possibly to be replaced by another sources --> in [[Ghulistan (Hyboria)|Ghulistan]].{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Afghulistan]]'s entry}} The [[Irakzai (Earth-616)|Irakzai]] were their hated foes.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #112|; A Dream of Empire}}

Another tribe of [[Ghulistan (Hyboria)|Greater Ghulistan]], the [[Khurakzai (Earth-616)|Khurakzai]], was possibly a branch of the Afghuli.{{r|Handbook of the Conan Universe #1|; [[Afghulistan]]'s entry}}

[[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]] aspired<!-- as ascended or hoped to ascend? --> to become their chief.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #30|; A Gazetteer of the Hyborian Age, Afghuli's entry}}<!-- exact same words of the entry, hard to change as there is few words: to be replaced by another sources -->
